comment: Alt-right shills for Trump frequently accuse his detractors (i.e. the mentally sane) of having unreasonably high expectations. "You're whining because he hasn't gone full RAHOWA!" Nope. Actually, we would have been fine with basic civic nationalism & populism, at least for the time being. This orange motherfucker fails BASIC tests for competence.
